## HttpErrorPayload interface

Represents the action dispatched when there are http errors returned from optimistic requests. Triggers the  action.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HttpErrorPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [httpError](./optimistic-http.httperrorpayload.httperror.md) | HttpErrorResponse | The error response from the external api |
